body.description: The scale has high quality LCD display in different weight units: kg, lb and easily know your place climate temperature. The weight of the scale is light, small in volume and convenient to carry. With a button operation, you can turn on the scales and replace the weight units. It has a high precision strain sensor system with the rubber paint. This scale is suitable for family, business, tourism or outdoor activities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Traveler's Best Friend: Etekcity Luggage Scale Gets It Right
reviews.reviewText: As someone who frequently travels for both work and leisure, I've been in more than one situation where I've found myself anxious about exceeding luggage weight limits. Enter the Etekcity Luggage Scale, a game-changer that has made my travel experience significantly less stressful. Below, I outline the features that make this portable scale indispensable:Precision and Accuracy:When it comes to weighing luggage, even a slight miscalculation can lead to hefty fees at the airport. The Etekcity Luggage Scale offers exceptional accuracy, allowing you to plan your packing with precision. The digital display is easy to read and reliably accurate within a very small margin of error.Compact and Portable:The scale is compact enough to fit into your carry-on or even a larger pocket. Its lightweight and portable design makes it convenient to take with you wherever you go, ensuring you're prepared for that return journey when your luggage might be packed with souvenirs.Easy to Use:Simply attach the scale's hook to your suitcase handle, lift, and read the weight on the digital display. The process is quick, straightforward, and can be done single-handedly. It couldn't be more user-friendly.Durable Construction:Despite its small size, this scale is surprisingly robust. The construction feels sturdy, and the hook is strong enough to hold even heavier bags without any signs of strain.Multi-Functionality:The Etekcity Luggage Scale isn’t limited to just suitcases. Its versatile design allows for weighing a variety of items, from backpacks to packages, making it useful in multiple scenarios beyond travel.Battery Life:The scale comes with a long-lasting battery, which means you don't have to worry about it running out in the middle of your trip. Additionally, the auto-off function helps preserve battery life when the scale is not in use.My Opinion:In my view, the Etekcity Luggage Scale is an invaluable tool for any traveler. It's efficient, accurate, and incredibly handy, removing much of the guesswork and stress associated with packing. The product not only fulfills its primary function excellently but also offers additional features that add to its overall utility.Would I buy it again? Absolutely. It's a small investment for significant peace of mind. Would I recommend it to others? Without a doubt—especially for frequent travelers or those who like to shop extensively while abroad.In summary, if you're in search of a reliable, portable, and accurate luggage scale, the Etekcity Luggage Scale should be at the top of your list. It's a travel accessory that quickly proves its worth, ensuring you never have to face unexpected overweight baggage fees again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Travel Smarter with the Etekcity Luggage Scale: Your Ultimate Travel Companion!
reviews.reviewText: Are you tired of the stress and uncertainty of overweight luggage during your travels? Look no further than the Etekcity Luggage Scale—a game-changing travel essential that has revolutionized my packing experience. With its user-friendly design, accurate weight measurement, temperature sensor, and portable convenience, this handheld scale is an indispensable companion for jet setters.Effortless Weight Measurement:Say goodbye to hefty baggage fees and last-minute repacking! The Etekcity Luggage Scale offers reliable and precise weight measurements of up to 110 pounds (50 kilograms). Simply attach the strap to your luggage, lift, and let the scale display the weight on its easy-to-read digital screen. This intuitive process takes the guesswork out of packing, allowing you to travel with confidence and avoid unnecessary costs.Temperature Sensor:Beyond its weight measurement capabilities, the Etekcity Luggage Scale goes the extra mile with its integrated temperature sensor. This feature enables you to keep track of the ambient temperature wherever you go, allowing you to adjust your travel plans or packing strategies accordingly. It's a thoughtful addition that enhances your overall travel experience and ensures you're well-prepared for any climate.Portable and Convenient:Designed with portability in mind, this handheld scale is compact and lightweight, making it a breeze to carry in your luggage or backpack. Its slim profile and ergonomic grip ensure a comfortable and secure hold while weighing your bags. Additionally, the scale's rubber paint finish adds a touch of durability, protecting it from scratches and providing a sleek aesthetic.User-Friendly Design:The Etekcity Luggage Scale is incredibly easy to use, even for those unfamiliar with technology. The large, backlit digital display ensures clear visibility, making it effortless to read the weight measurements, even in dimly lit environments. The straightforward buttons allow for simple operation, and the auto-off feature helps preserve battery life, ensuring long-lasting use throughout your travels.Travel with Confidence:I can't stress enough the peace of mind that comes with knowing the exact weight of your luggage. The Etekcity Luggage Scale eliminates the anxiety and guesswork, enabling you to pack efficiently and avoid unnecessary surprises at the check-in counter. Its accuracy, reliability, and ease of use make it an essential tool for frequent travelers or anyone embarking on a memorable journey.In conclusion, the Etekcity Luggage Scale is an absolute must-have for any traveler seeking a stress-free packing experience. Its accurate weight measurements, temperature sensor, portable design, and user-friendly features make it an invaluable travel companion. Say goodbye to overweight luggage and hello to hassle-free adventures with this reliable and compact scale. Invest in the Etekcity Luggage Scale and embark on your travels with confidence and peace of mind!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Tool, better than expected!
reviews.reviewText: If you travel and worry about your luggage weight, then this scale can be very handy. I do not like surprises at the ticket counter and definitely do not want to pay for extra weight to my luggage or go through the hassle of rearranging things in your bags at the very last minute. This product is very well made and is very accurate. I weigh my bags that are up to 35 kgs. This scale is very sturdy and very accurate too. You could use this scale to weigh other things at home as well. Very easy to use. Small in size so very easy to carry. Definitely great value for the money spent. Highly recommended!
Works like a charm...exact weight! Small and very easy to use.
La precisión es muy buena y además muy practica para llevar en la maleta.
